title: In France, Far-Right Presidential Candidate Zemmour Faces Accusations of Sexual Misconduct
sub_head: Eight women say Eric Zemmour made unwanted sexual advances toward them when he was a prominent journalist and TV pundit
body:
PARISâ€”Several women accused far-right presidential candidate Eric Zemmour of sexual misconduct in a video posted on a French website Tuesday.
In a video posted on Mediapart, a French news site, eight women said Mr. Zemmour used his position as a prominent journalist in France to make unwanted sexual advances toward them between 1999 and 2019.
